name: Air Scrubb
description:
Made in Unity 2021 for the Eco jam #1

The Game

Keep the air clean with your fleet of air scrubber ships for as long as you can, while the industries below keep over producing out of greed.

3rd Party Stuff
  • Game Engine Unity
  • Most models were build using Asset Forge Deluxe, with the exception of 3D Low Poly Earth .
  • Input icons from Gamepad UI / Controller Prompts Pack
  • Sound effects generated using SFXR.
